title: Cluster
description: The earth is a frozen wasteland, civilization reduced to surviving in a huddle of buildings known as The Cluster.Steven Novak works on Maintenance Team 326 with his partner Simms. When they are drafted by the military to work at the secret, abandoned Outpost 13, Novak is confronted with a reality that shatters his world.Experiencing the memories of an army Captain that have been injected into his body using nano technology, Novak learns of a danger that could mean the destruction of mankind.Joining forces with a team of outlawed Anachronists, he must resurrect a centuries-old military project and fight for Earth.Cluster is a 15,000 word novelette that begins the military science fiction Cluster series.
author: Rider England
